data.comment: The big names in today's match at Lotto Park have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Lotto Park.
In the minute 18, Goal! Anderlecht have got their heads in front thanks to a Lukas Nmecha strike.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 56, Anderlecht have been awarded a penalty...
Anderlecht are going well in Brussels. They now lead 2-0 thanks to a Lukas Nmecha penalty.
Kristian Arnstad is on a sub for Michel Vlap for Anderlecht.
In the minute 69, Lucas Lissens (Anderlecht) has been sent off!
Killian Sardella is replacing Paul Mukairu for Anderlecht at Lotto Park.
Alexander Blessin is making the team's first substitution at Lotto Park with Marko Kvasina replacing Ari Skulason.
In the minute 71, The away team have replaced Francois Marquet with Cameron McGeehan. This is the second substitution made today by Alexander Blessin.
The away team replace Robbie D'Haese with Theo Ndicka.
Own goal! Cameron McGeehan has scored at the wrong end to make it 2-1.
In the minute 85, Kemar Lawrence is replacing Anouar Ait El Hadj for the home team.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Frederik Jakel (Oostende) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Oostende's Theo Ndicka has been booked in Brussels.
